front.title: IEEE Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) for Exchanging Automatic Test Information via XML: Exchanging Test Station Information

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An exchange format, utilizing XML, for identifying all of the hardware, software, and documentation associated with a test station is specified in this document. This test station may be used as a component of a test program set to test and diagnose a unit under test.
